tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE natural_selection_analysis (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    sex VARCHAR,
    genetic_variation DECIMAL,
    geographical_location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE StatisticalAnalysis (
	analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	population_id UUID,
	analysis_date DATE,
	analysis_result JSON,
	FOREIGN KEY (population_id) REFERENCES Population(population_id)
);

CREATE TABLE population_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  population_id INT,
  age INT,
  sex VARCHAR(10),
  trait VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE Population ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, population_size INT, average_fitness FLOAT, generation_number INT );
CREATE TABLE Individual ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, population_id INT, phenotype VARCHAR(255), fitness FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE GeneticVariation ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, individual_id INT, mutation_rate FLOAT, allele VARCHAR(1) );
CREATE TABLE SelectionPressure ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, population_id INT, type VARCHAR(50), intensity FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE EvolutionaryModel ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, model_name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT );
